Overview.name: Overview0
Overview.content: In OpenCms contents are stored as XML files. Thus, the structure of a content of specific type, but also much of its behavior, is specified in an XML schema definition (XSD). Those XSDs themselves must comply with a special structure. In this topic you'll learn about the general structure of such schemas and learn how to create a new schema in OpenCms.

Teaser.name: Teaser0
Teaser.content: For each content type the structure and content specific behavior is specified in XML schema defintions. Find out how to write such a defintion.
